ygData.subject: Re: Sad story, Questions, ***SPOILER ***, Laugh
ygData.msgSnippet: So how long did it take you to get your OGRE GOOD enough so the guards didn t kill him on sight in the good cites?? Does CHR matter on this point? Can anyone
ygData.messageBody:
So how long did it take you to get your OGRE "GOOD" enough so the guards
didn't kill him on sight in the good cites??

Does CHR matter on this point?

Can anyone give me info about playing an evil race and "GETTING GOOD"
enought to go to a good race zone . ..

(I want to start a Dark Elf or TSK)

Thanks

From: <mprez20@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 11:45 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Sad story, Questions, ***SPOILER ***, Laugh


> From: mprez20@...
>
> Yes you can, Evil Races can be bound ANYWHERE. Although it obvisouly
isn't
> wise to bind yourself in some, but it can be done. I have done it and had
it
> done to me with my Ogre Character
